title: Physical Education Teacher: (Airoli, Nerul & Panvel)
tagsAndSkills: physical education,PE Teacher,Coaching,Sports,Athletics,Physical Training,B.PED,Teaching
jobDescription:
Overview

The quality of school education available to students from low-income communities across India is abysmal. Their chances of getting admitted to a college or building a career are much lower than their high-income peers, condemning them to a life without voice or choice. iTeach was born to declare war on this status quo and create a level playing field for ALL children. We do this in Pune and Navi Mumbai by co-creating contextual school models with Municipal Corporations.

We run 10 free and high-impact secondary schools and a college-to-career program for the most disadvantaged students. In 2024, with a staff of 250 members across 10 schools, we will serve 3000 students and 2000 alumni - giving students a fighting chance at college, career, and citizenship. We aim to grow to 30 schools and 10,000 students over the next five years. 
Take a peek into our world by visiting www.iteachschools.org


Key Responsibilities:

A teacher at iTeach Schools wears multiple hats to ensure an excellent education for their students. The three different parts of the role are:

l - Teaching your subject (60% time)

  • Use existing resources and design innovative Annual Plans, Unit Plans, and Lesson Plans
  • Teach one or two subjects of your expertise to your class (about 30 students in each class)
  • Conduct regular tests and assessments to monitor learning and give feedback to students
  • Build a positive and strong school culture with a focus on learning and joy
  • Collaborate with the parents of the students through regular meetings to create a positive learning environment

ll - Mentoring students (20% time)

  • Mentor nearly 15-20 students throughout the year
  • Develop ways to ensure that these students have strong study habits, high attendance, and the drive to excel-share these plans with all teachers across the ecosystem
  • Mentor students to identify a best-fit career after Grade X

lll - Leading projects in school (20% time)

  • Work with the School Principal and Vice Principal to lead multiple projects essential to student learning (based on your talents), such as Annual Day, Sports Day, Hobby Clubs, etc.
  • Use these opportunities to strengthen your leadership skills and mentor new teachers

Education & Experience:

  • Required: B P. Ed Degree
  • Preferred: Teaching experience in a secondary grade for 1-2 years.

Compensation and Benefits: We take pride in offering competitive compensation and benefits commensurate with the candidate's education and work experience. The salary range for this position ranges from 3.5 - 4.4 LPA CTC, and we are dedicated to providing top-notch industry benefits. These benefits include PF, gratuity, medical insurance (up to 3 lakh PA), paid leaves, annual increments, and promotion opportunities.

title: Collection Agent (Digital Debt Consultant) - International -MENA
tagsAndSkills: Good English Communication,Collections Process,Debt Recovery,Collections,International Voice Process,Debt Collection,Good Typing Skills,Good Convincing Skills
jobDescription:
Job Description : Collection Agent - MENA Process.


Who are we?


We at spocto are developing a full stack collections platform that is powered by AI ML capabilities, that is radically changing collections within the debt industry.


In March 2022, we became Indias fastest fintech and most impactful start-up to join the unicorn club with a Series B fundraising round of $137 million.


We already have all the top Banks and NBFCs as our clients. We have offices in Mumbai, Chennai, Bangalore and Dubai. We plan to expand our business across the EU, USA and SE Asia over the next couple of years.


Role & responsibilities :-


  • To collect the delinquent amount from the customer over the phone or take promises from them on payment confirmation.
  • Understanding about buckets and Write off portfolio.
  • Should be able to effectively communicate while providing quality customer service as well as actively pursue knowledge of skills and tools to be used in all collection efforts.
  • Work with team members and team leads to achieve monthly targets.
  • Proven 1 - 3 years of experience in a Collection Process , Customer Service & Voice Process, If fresher should have excellent Communication skills & Typing skills.
  • Proficient in Writing Skills (Email, Good Typing etc.)

Requirements: -

  • Should be fluent in English & Excellent Communication skills.
  • Certification (e.g. DRA) is a big plus & Collection background .
  • Proven 1 - 3 years of experience in a Collection Process, Customer Service & Voice Process etc.
  • Proficient in Writing Skills (Email, Good Typing).
  • Graduation is mandatory.
  • Good Team Player.
  • Day Shifts Only
